column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////After some shopping around the area
column2: we stopped by Cafe Ba Ba Reeba at around 9pm on a Friday night
column3: and the place was PACKED! We were certain that we wouldn't need reservations for a 9pm dinner
column4: but no such luck--there was barely any room to move around! However
column5: we were able to find seats at the bar and enjoyed a meal of delicious sangrias
